summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4201 for the improvement of 1st Avenue Northeast, from East 77th Street to East 82nd Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49936, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
